mapper.insert: insert into t_order(userid, betsiteid, betid, redballs, blueballs, times, ordertime) values (#{userId}, #{betSiteId}, #{betId}, #{redBalls}, #{blueBalls}, #{times}, now())
mapper.select: select id, userid, betsiteid, betid, redballs, blueballs, times, ordertime from t_order where userid = #{userId} and ordertime >= date_format(date_sub(now(),interval 1 day ), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
